name: TC-013: Create a new home page from blank when there is no home page is published

attachments.name: Open website with URL: https://admin.shopify.com/store/quynhquynhiee/apps/wip-pagefly/pages

steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //h1[@class='Polaris-Header-Title']
==> The Text is: Pages

steps.name: Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Click on the element By.id: home

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: home

steps.name: Click on the element By.chained({By.xpath: //*[@id="AppFrameMain"]//*[@class="Polaris-IndexTable"],By.xpath: //button[@aria-label='Search and filter results']})
Verify element visible By.chained({By.xpath: //*[@id="AppFrameMain"]//*[@class="Polaris-IndexTable"],By.xpath: //button[@aria-label='Search and filter results']})

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.chained({By.xpath: //*[@id="AppFrameMain"]//*[@class="Polaris-IndexTable"],By.xpath: //button[@aria-label='Search and filter results']})

steps.name: Click on the element By.chained({By.xpath: //*[@id="AppFrameMain"]//*[@class="Polaris-IndexTable"],By.xpath: //button[@aria-label='Add filter']})

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.chained({By.xpath: //*[@id="AppFrameMain"]//*[@class="Polaris-IndexTable"],By.xpath: //button[@aria-label='Add filter']})
Clicked on the element By.xpath: //div[@class='Polaris-Popover']//button[@role='menuitem'][.//*[text()='Status']]
Clicked on the element By.xpath: //div[@class='Polaris-Popover']//label[@for='published-status-filter'][.//*[text()='Published']]

steps.name: Verify element NOT visible By.xpath: (//tbody/tr[//td[@id='pages--table--status']/span[@class='Polaris-Badge Polaris-Badge--toneSuccess']//*[text()='Published']])[1] with timeout 5 second
Create a new home page from blank and save and publish successfully
Create a new HOME page from blank
Click on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: home-blank

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: home-blank

steps.name: Wait for the page to be loaded
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Change the page title to Test HOME Mon May 27 11:31:58 ICT 2024
Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Clear and Fill text on element not reachable by keyboard
Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Set text on text box and press key

attachments.name: Press key ENTER on keyboard
Clear and Fill Test HOME Mon May 27 11:31:58 ICT 2024 on By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--other-save-actions-btn

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--other-save-actions-btn
Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--save-and-publish-page-btn

steps.name: Confirm 'Before Publish' modal when the page is titled
Verify text Your page is ready to publish! of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Your page is ready to publish!
Page title
*
Page URL
*
Cancel
Publish

==> The Text is: Your page is ready to publish!
Page title
*
Page URL
*
Cancel

parameters.name: text
parameters.value: Your page is ready to publish!

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: menubar--save-modal--primary

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: menubar--save-modal--primary

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (97c19fa40970b7e44294bc66620b529d)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Verify text Publishing homepage of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Publishing homepage
Once published, this page will replace your current home page.
To restore your original homepage, unpublish or delete this page.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Publish

==> The Text is: Publishing homepage
Once published, this page will replace your current home page.
To restore your original homepage, unpublish or delete this page.

Clicked on the element By.xpath: .//*[@role='dialog']//button//*[text()='Publish']

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (97c19fa40970b7e44294bc66620b529d)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*[@class="Polaris-Frame-Toast"]//*[text()="Page published"] with timeout 30 second
Verify text Enable autosave? of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable
Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (97c19fa40970b7e44294bc66620b529d)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Verify page saved and published successfully
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*[@id="editor-header-bar--status"]//*/span[@class="Polaris-Badge Polaris-Badge--toneSuccess"]//*[text()="Saved"] with timeout 30 second
